page.description: Sort a CRLF delimited string from shortest entries to longest entries
page.syntax: New_List as C = sortstring_by_length(C string [,C direction ])
page.discussion: The SORTSTRING_BY_LENGTH() function sorts a CR-LF delimited list by the length of its entries.
page.example: dim s as C s = #a #ab #abc #abcd #af #%a% ? sortstring_by_length(s) = a af ab abc abcd
